body:
Comment 1: 
I read from release.2010-06-09
http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/e489973cd29905d0#
"The type checking rules around assignments and conversions are simpler but more
restrictive: assignments no longer convert implicitly from *[10]int to []int"

shoulp be Status:fixed ,not Status:Accepted
or 6g still allows this
